title: Twitter 2FA text service was secretly helping governments locate people, obtain call logs
content:
The cofounder of a Twitter 2FA text service is reported to have been secretly selling access to its networks to governments, enabling them to locate people of interest â€“ and in some cases obtain their phone logs …
